entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Assertion failed 'arg->OperIsStore() || arg->OperIsCopyBlkOp()' in PGO testing #68472
  • Unable to deserialize char-based Enum #68471
  • Assertion failed '!"Shouldn't see an integer typed GT_MOD node in ARM64"' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #68470
    7.0.0
  • Add PoolingAsyncValueTaskMethodBuilder to System.Net.Security.SslStream.ReadAsyncInternal() #68467
  • NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException #68461
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V2.0-Beta2\\b399444\\b399444b\\b399444b.cmd #68455
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.DirectoryInfo_SymbolicLinks.ResolveLinkTarget_ReturnFinalTarget_ChainOfLinks_ExceedsLimit_Throws #68454
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Tests.HostTests.CreateDefaultBuilder_SecretsDoesReload #68453
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/processenvironment/processenvironment/processenvironment.sh #68452
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\nullabletypes\\castclassvaluetype_ro\\castclassvaluetype_ro.cmd #68451

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'fgDomsComputed' during 'Determine first cold block' (Tier0-FullOpts) #67871
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\shortenregisteredlocal\\shortenregisteredlocal.cmd #68306
    7.0.0
  • About time incorrect of docker image about aspnet-6 #62545
    6.0.x
  • NativeAOT: write dgml regardless the failure of compilation #66813
    Future
  • Always prefer IComparer<T> than Comparison<T> because delegates are slow #68465
  • Update System.Runtime.Experimental to support .NET 7 Preview 3 changes #68458
  • Introduce abstractions for buffer managed reading and writing #28884
    Future
  • Environment.SpecialFolder should expose FOLDERID_Downloads and FOLDERID_Public values #25577
    Future
  • the different between "" and String.Empty #68462

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix caching of Lazy<T> in tests #68473
  • Decouple call store operands from local ret buf optimization #68469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove stores as operands of calls in LIR #68460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix significant TP diff check for percentages #68459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ValueTask pooling in more places #68457
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Reduce leaked test files #68456
    area-System.IO

Merged

  • Make PlatformDetection.IsInHelix lazy #68445
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: run remorph stress before fgRemoveDeadBlocks #68420
  • Update jitrollingbuild.py to use retrying download from jitutil.py #68442
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fixing and improving `impBoxPatternMatch` #68382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • AddUserSecrets fails in environments without generic env var and OS special folders #67895
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Improve the redundant branch optimization to handle more side effects #68447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable runtime tests on Windows ARM64v8 queues #68377
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Use a faster sort algorithm pdqsort for Array.Sort #68436
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Android][tvOS] Skip failing System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Removed TempFile and TempDirectory from FileSystemWatcher Tests #68444
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Override CompleteAsync() in StreamPipeReader to call Stream.DisposeAsync #67565
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
